name: Astronomer
passive: Advantage on finding items using a map

abilities.1: Always know the direction of North
abilities.2: Can always retrace steps to find the path
abilities.3: Advantage on navigating spacecraft or seacraft
abilities.4: Advantage on dexterity checks when navigating unexplored places
abilities.5: Sense of direction may draw you to fortune once per month

description: Star-charts, sextants, and sky logic — astronomers are the navigators of the cosmos. They read the stars like ancient texts and can find treasure where others see nothing but space.

name: Doctor
passive: You have one cure that you are known for

abilities.1: Group regains double HP when recovering
abilities.3: Advantage on finding a cure for familiar people
abilities.5: Once per month, can find a cure without a roll

description: Life savers and miracle workers, doctors in Infinite Ages are more than healers — they’re legends. Known across sectors for their signature cures.

name: Creative
passive: You have a signature style that has gained popularity

abilities.1: Art can influence emotions or opinions; advantage on persuasion/deception
abilities.2: Advantage on finding buyers, venues, or collaborators
abilities.3: Once per month gain inspiration for creative performance
abilities.4: Create a legendary masterpiece once per month
abilities.5: Receive exclusive invites and gain a new artistic proficiency

description: Visionaries and cultural architects — creatives shape the emotional fabric of society. Their art changes hearts, starts revolutions, and leaves legacies.

name: Software Engineer / Mathematician
passive: Advantage on creating algorithms or code

abilities.1: Can make skill rolls with objects without spending actions
abilities.2: Can create and sell functional apps and algorithms
abilities.3: Advantage on identifying issues with puzzles or machines
abilities.5: Encode and decode secret messages with math/code

description: Whether bending logic or writing reality, these tech masters are the silent architects of modern civilization — fluent in numbers, systems, and secrets.

name: Engineer
passive: Engineering credentials grant access to corporate labs

abilities.1: Builds cost half the normal amount
abilities.2: Can patent and sell their builds
abilities.3: Armor repairs add an extra d4 of armor points
abilities.4: Advantage on crafting a specialized item
abilities.5: Specialized item builds take half the time and successes

description: From prototype to product, engineers invent, build, and optimize. Their innovations fuel war machines and civilian miracles alike.

name: Bounty Hunter
passive: Chance to detect high-value bounties when entering establishments (1d20: 19–20)

abilities.2: No penalty for called shots against bounties
abilities.3: Advantage on speech checks with law enforcement
abilities.5: Rates are doubled; 25% discount on bounty gear

description: Merciless or moral, bounty hunters are apex predators — armed with grit, instincts, and a license to bring the galaxy's worst to justice.

name: Mechanic
passive: Fix any item once per day without parts or tools

abilities.1: Advantage on repairs in high-stakes situations
abilities.2: Chance to enhance or weaken item on repair roll
abilities.5: Extra roll on crafting table once per day

description: Tinkerers, hackers, and saviors of dying tech — mechanics keep old worlds spinning and new ideas alive.

name: Scrapper
passive: Scrap without tools; chance to find rare item on 1d20 roll of 19–20

abilities.1: Can estimate salvage value on sight

description: Urban scavengers and scrap kings. What others see as junk, scrappers see as treasure, profit, or weapons in disguise.

name: Miner

abilities.1: Can estimate resource value of terrain by panning
abilities.3: Advantage when bartering for items or land
abilities.4: Chance to find treasure while mining (1d20: 19–20)
abilities.5: Can always find contracts for mining or logistics

description: Diggers of fate and fortune, miners are rugged, sturdy, and indispensable to the industrial lifeblood of the galaxy.

name: Entrepreneur
passive: Can talk down combatants without disadvantage

abilities.1: Reduce cost of services by 10% for up to 10 businesses
abilities.2: Can forge contracts using the crafting table
abilities.5: Earns 10% of all marketed business income

description: Smooth, smart, and always closing — entrepreneurs turn charm into currency and dreams into empire.

name: Hustler
passive: Advantage in games of chance; can always double or nothing (loses advantage if you do)

abilities.1: Advantage on stealth rolls when plans go sideways
abilities.3: Advantage on pickpocketing after playing games
abilities.4: Always spot other hustlers without rolling
abilities.5: Insight checks against you have disadvantage

description: Conmen, gamblers, and charismatic scoundrels — hustlers make their living one fast deal or shady bet at a time.

name: Adventurist
passive: One dexterity check per day at advantage

abilities.2: Reroll any roll once per day
abilities.3: Ignore dexterity-based disadvantage once per day
abilities.4: Give party 1d6 temporary HP with a pre-battle speech

description: Thrill-seekers and danger junkies — adventurists chase the unknown, ride chaos, and always land on their feet.
